Context:
* Late applications for Winter 2024 programs at George Brown College will be accepted from January 8th to January 19th, 2024.
* Applications can be submitted through ontariocolleges.ca.
* Domestic students in Ontario apply to all colleges through OntarioColleges.ca and can apply for up to five programs and up to three at any one college.
* Key dates:
  * Earliest date for offers of admission is November 1, 2023.
  * May 1, 2024 is the deadline date to confirm an offer of admission and pay deposit.
  * Apply by February 1, 2024 for equal consideration for highly competitive programs.
* Campus locations: St. James Campus (200 King St. East) and Casa Loma Campus (160 Kendal Ave.).
* Application process for domestic students involves finding programs using the Program Finder tool, completing an online application form at OntarioColleges.ca, and sending academic documents to OntarioColleges.ca with a non-refundable $110 application fee.
file_path: scraped_pages/otherpages/How to Apply to George Brown College | George Brown College.txt

Context: Academic documents should be sent to OntarioColleges.ca. Applicants can track their application status online at STU-VIEW. To access STU-VIEW, applicants need their student ID and password. Once an application is complete, the college will notify the applicant. The college's phone number is 416-415-2000, and the TTY number is 1-877-515-5559. Applicants can contact ask.george@georgebrown.ca for inquiries. The college has a social media hub. Information on the website is subject to change without notice and should not be considered as a representation, offer or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
